sentences.sContent: The barometer is falling (= showing that it will probably rain).
sentences.sCn: 气压在下降（表示可能要下雨）。

synos.tran: [气象]气压计；睛雨表；显示变化的事物

words.tran: [气象] 自动记录式气压计

trans.tranOther: an instrument that measures changes in the air pressure and the weather, or that calculates height above sea level
